sections.heading: Who Can Open
points: A single adult
Joint account (up to 3 adults) - Joint A or Joint B
A guardian on behalf of a minor
A guardian on behalf of a person of unsound mind
A minor above 10 years in his own name
Note: Any number of accounts can be opened

sections.heading: Deposits
points: Account can be opened by cash or cheque
Date of deposit is the date of cheque clearance if opened by cheque
Minimum monthly deposit: Rs. 100 and in multiples of Rs. 10
If account is opened by 15th of month, deposit by 15th
If account is opened after 15th, deposit by last working day of month

sections.heading: Default
points: If deposit not made on time, default fee applies
Default fee: Rs. 1 for every Rs. 100 denomination (proportionate for others)
Defaulted deposits must be cleared first before new deposit
After 4 regular defaults, account is discontinued
Discontinued accounts can be revived within 2 months of 4th default
After revival window, no further deposits are allowed
If â‰¤4 defaults, account holder may extend maturity by number of defaults and deposit during extension

sections.heading: Advance Deposit
points: Advance deposit allowed up to 5 years if account not discontinued
Rebate on advance deposit of at least 6 installments
Rs. 10 rebate for 6 months, Rs. 40 for 12 months (for Rs. 100 denomination)
Advance deposit can be made during account opening or later

sections.heading: Loan
points: Available after 12 installments and 1 year of continued account
Loan up to 50% of balance
Repayable in lump sum or equal monthly installments
Interest: 2% above RD interest rate
Interest calculated from withdrawal to repayment date
If not repaid, loan + interest deducted from maturity value
Note: Submit loan form and passbook at Post Office

sections.heading: Premature Closure
points: Allowed after 3 years from account opening via application
If closed before maturity, PO Savings Account interest rate applies
Premature closure not allowed until all advance deposits are exhausted

sections.heading: Maturity
points: 5 years (60 monthly deposits) from account opening
Extension allowed for additional 5 years with application
Interest during extension as per original opening rate
Extended account can be closed anytime
For full years, RD interest rate applies; for less, PO Savings rate
Account can be retained for 5 years post maturity without deposits

sections.heading: Repayment on Death
points: Nominee or legal heirs can claim balance by submitting claim
After approval, nominee/heir can continue account till maturity
Note: As per National Savings Recurring Deposit Account Rules 2019
